protein.specific_function: Formation of iron-sulfur complexes, cyanide detoxification or modification of sulfur-containing enzymes. Other thiol compounds, besides cyanide, can act as sulfur ion acceptors. Also has weak mercaptopyruvate sulfurtransferase (MST) activity (By similarity). Together with MRPL18, acts as a mitochondrial import factor for the cytosolic 5S rRNA. Only the nascent unfolded cytoplasmic form is able to bind to the 5S rRNA.

reference.reference_text: Aita N, Ishii K, Akamatsu Y, Ogasawara Y, Tanabe S: Cloning and expression of human liver rhodanese cDNA. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1997 Feb 3;231(1):56-60.
